events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund because it does not match what I purchased.
The system has identified this issue as a refund request based on the customer's description of receiving an incorrect item.
Assigning this case to a customer service agent specializing in refund processing for further assistance.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I'll help you with the refund process as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify and proceed with your refund?
My order number is 789456123, and I have attached a photo showing the item I received, which is different from what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate your refund immediately and send you a return label to send back the incorrect item at no cost.
Thanks for the quick response and support. I appreciate the return label and prompt refund offer.
Your refund request is processed, and you will receive confirmation via email shortly. Please send the item back using the provided label.
Just checking in to confirm you received the return label and if you need any further assistance with your refund process.
Yes, I received the label and mailed the item back yesterday. Thank you for your help.
We have received your returned item and completed the refund transaction. Your case is now closed. Thank you for your patience.
We'd appreciate it if you could take a moment to complete a short survey regarding your experience with this refund process.
